attributes.additional_details:
We are asking the DoH to review the GDC's annual retention fee for Dental Care Professionals.
This is over £50 more than members of the National College of Nursing and Midwifery. The standard of pay between the two professions is substantial. We are asked to pay indemnity insurance, ARF and pay for our own CPD to continue our registration with the average wage not reflecting our experience and knowledge.
